message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you first. I think it would be a great fit for you.  I'm looking for $200 to make it worth my while. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $100 is too low, I'm willing to come down a bit to meet you halfway. How about $170?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to make a counteroffer. How about $140? I'm willing to meet you halfway from your previous offer.
